name: A2A Flyers
description:
Enjoy the long-lasting flight of almighty A2A . Collecting all the rings of Wisdom to conquer the game :).  Well me and my partner Akarshan K. made  this short game in a team of 2 during our 1st semester break of clg :). It was really fun experience to play the game.

You must be bored after reading this.....now go and play :).

P.S  Do give feedback via comment section to help us improve.
